thread.title: BRIEF-Cynergistek Makes Advance Payment Of Bank Debt

title: BRIEF-Cynergistek Makes Advance Payment Of Bank Debt

organizations.name: brief-cynergistek makes advance payment of bank

text: March 12, 2018 / 11:42 PM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Cynergistek Makes Advance Payment Of Bank Debt Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Cynergistek Inc: * CYNERGISTEK MAKES ADVANCE PAYMENT OF BANK DEBT AND NEGOTIATES NEW FINANCING WITH BMO HARRIS BANK * ‍COMMENSURATE WITH THIS RESTRUCTURING, MICHAEL HERNANDEZ HAS RESIGNED AS COO OF CYNERGISTEK EFFECTIVE MARCH 12​ * CYNERGISTEK -‍RESTRUCTURING INCLUDED PAYING OFF CO’S AVIDBANK TERM LOAN * CYNERGISTEK -‍RESTRUCTURING INCLUDED 75 PERCENT OF AMOUNT DUE PURSUANT TO PROMISSORY NOTES FROM JAN 2017 ACQUISITION OF CYNERGISTEK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
